title: 1. The Umbrella Academy
description: A show about a dysfunctional family of superheroes who must work together to stop an impending apocalypse.

title: 2. The Flash
description: A show about a crime scene investigator who gains super speed powers and uses them to protect the city from dangerous villains.

title: 3. Titans
description: A show about a group of young superheroes who must come together to fight the forces of evil.

title: 4. Doom Patrol
description: A show about a group of outcasts and misfits with special abilities who must band together to save the world.

title: 5. Supergirl
description: A show about a young woman with special abilities who must use her powers to protect her city and the world.

title: 6. The Boys
description: A show about a team of vigilantes who take on a powerful and corrupt superhero organization.

title: 7. Raising Dion
description: A show about a single mother raising a son with special powers and trying to protect him from those who want to exploit his powers.

title: 8. Cloak & Dagger
description: A show about two teenagers from different backgrounds who gain superpowers and must work together to save their city.

title: 9. Black Lightning
description: A show about a retired superhero who must come out of retirement to protect his city from dangerous forces.

title: 10. The Gifted
description: A show about a family of mutants who go on the run from a hostile government and must fight to survive.
